__e: And wisdom is knowing the difference between what you can change... And what you were born with.
What wisdom is more important than "don't buy something that might kill your neighbor?"
Lord grant me the wisdom and the strength to do what must be done.
Because, for all his great wisdom, he never understood how embarrassing it is to meet another dog when one isn't wearing one's own smell.
You're just full of wisdom,aren't you?
Why hasn't a clever man like you realized that I love Peter?
- Wisdom is what makes a good king.
"There is a wisdom that is woe, but there is a woe that is madness."
But I didn't find the wisdom...
...to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.
For reminding me to have the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to accept the things I can't.
By the wisdom of my father, whom some of you may know.
The courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.
You know the thing where you ask for the strength to change the things that you can and the wisdom to know the difference?
- Wait for it. "And the courage to change the things that I can, and the wisdom to know the difference."
Ooh,you must pass the dungeon wisdom test.
The one who has brought us the wisdom... of the true belief.
